Class COM.sootNsmoke.oolong.DumpClass 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----COM.sootNsmoke.oolong.DumpClass
public class DumpClass
extends Object
A class for producing a byte-by-byte disassembly of a class file. This is more detailed than javap or Gnoloo, since it displays the exact constant pool and all of the attributes.
